message.text: Please ensure your base has a raised flag, and remember to lower it before abandoning it.
For assistance or to report an issue, please contact the owner :Dieselunow.
Please send a screenshot of your base location to Dieselunow to confirm its position and protect it from base wipes.
Please note that unscheduled server restarts may take place to apply necessary fixes and introduce additional content.
This PVE server prohibits KOS, raiding, griefing, exploits, and scripting. Respect all players, do not hoard vehicles, and do not block off large areas of the map.
A trader is located at Radio Zennit. Please contact The_man_jag1999 for all transactions. Cigarettes are used as the server's currency.
Admins will broadcast a radio network on 96.6 MHz. Tune in for announcements.
